entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
